rows: Mixed convex and disconnected, mixed uni and multi-modal
Non-convex, spread of solutions changes over time
Convex, each decision space has its own rate of change
Changes from convex to concave and vice versa
Convex POF, spread of the POF solutions changes over time
Discontinuous POF, with various disconnected continuous sub-regions
POF changes from convex to concave, and vice versa
POF changes from convex to concave and vice versa
